## slugifyGH variable

Similar to [slugify](./strings.slugify.md)<!-- -->, however uses GitHub's anchor naming rules for headings in markdown files (AFAICT).

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
slugifyGH: (str: string) => string
```

## Example


```ts
slugifyGH("Me, myself (& Ã«ye)!")
// "me--myself--eye"

```
